# Brooks Floor Covering

> Brooks Floor Covering is a family-owned professional flooring company serving the Greater Phoenix Area, Arizona since 1980. We provide flooring sales, installation, repairs, concrete services, and specialty tile work for residential and commercial clients. Licensed, bonded, and insured — ROC #226840. Phone: (623) 688-8422. For comprehensive details, see [llms-full.txt](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/llms-full.txt).

Brooks Floor Covering has over 30 years of experience in the floor covering industry. We are known for exceptional quality, honest pricing, and going the extra mile on every project. We partner with industry-leading manufacturers including Mohawk, Shaw, Arizona Tile, Daltile, and others.

- **Service Area:** Greater Phoenix Area including Glendale, Mesa, Scottsdale, Chandler, Tempe, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, and surrounding communities

## Services

- [Flooring Sales & Installation](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services): We install hardwood, engineered wood, ceramic tile, natural stone, carpet, carpet tile, and luxury vinyl tile & plank for residential and commercial projects throughout the Greater Phoenix Area. Free in-home estimates available.
- [Floor Repairs](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services): We fix cracked tiles, restretch carpet, replace vinyl planks, repair grout, and fix carpet seams. Same-week scheduling available for most repairs.
- [Concrete Services](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services): We provide moisture mitigation, concrete grinding, floor leveling, SLU pours, epoxy coatings, and concrete polishing for residential and commercial properties.
- [Specialty Services](https://brooksfloorcovering.com/services): We build custom showers, install countertops and backsplashes, create fireplace surrounds, and handle all custom tile work.
